00029 #include "syx-types.h"
00030 #include "syx-profile.h"
00031 
00032 #ifdef HAVE_UNISTD_H
00033 #include <unistd.h>
00034 #endif
00035 #include <ctype.h>
00036 #include <fcntl.h>
00037 #include <sys/types.h>
00038 #include <sys/stat.h>
00039 
00040 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_TIME_H
00041   #include <sys/time.h>
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #ifdef HAVE_WINDOWS_H
00045   #include <windows.h>
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 /* Return current time seconds in nanoseconds */
00049 syx_uint64
00050 syx_nanotime (void)
00051 {
00052 #if defined(WINDOWS) && !defined(WINCE)
00053 
00054   syx_uint64 value;
00055   GetSystemTimeAsFileTime ((FILETIME *)&value);
00056   value = (value - (syx_uint64) 116444736000000000) * 100;
00057   return value;
00058 
00059 #elif !defined(WINDOWS) /* WINDOWS */
00060 
00061   struct timeval tv;
00062   gettimeofday (&tv, NULL);
00063   /* convert timeval to nanoseconds */
00064   return ((syx_uint64) tv.tv_sec * SYX_NSEC_PER_SEC) + tv.tv_usec * SYX_NSEC_PER_USEC;
00065 
00066 #endif
00067 }
00068 
00069 #ifdef SYX_PROFILE
00070 
00071 #define SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(name) syx_uint64 _p_ ## name = 0
00072 #define SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(p, s) printf(s ": %lu us\n", _p_ ## p)
00073 
00074 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(load_image);
00075 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(exec_state_fetch);
00076 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(block_context);
00077 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(method_context);
00078 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(send_message);
00079 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(perform_message);
00080 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(dict_access);
00081 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(fileop);
00082 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(blocking);
00083 SYX_PROFILE_TYPE(scheduler);
00084 
00085 void
00086 syx_profile_print (void)
00087 {
00088   puts ("--- Profile ---");
00089   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(load_image, "Image loading");
00090   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(exec_state_fetch, "Execution state fetch");
00091   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(method_context, "Method context creation");
00092   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(block_context, "Block context creation");
00093   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(send_message, "Send message");
00094   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(perform_message, "Perform message from ST");
00095   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(dict_access, "Dictionary access");
00096   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(fileop, "File operations");
00097   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(blocking, "Total blocking processes");
00098   SYX_PROFILE_PRINT(scheduler, "Total scheduler including nested blocking processes");
00099   printf("Total: %lu us\n", (_p_scheduler ? _p_scheduler : _p_blocking) + _p_load_image);
00100   puts ("---------------");
00101 }
00102 
00103 #else /* SYX_PROFILE */
00104 
00105 void
00106 syx_profile_print (void)
00107 {
00108 }
00109 
00110 #endif /* SYX_PROFILE */
